newsitem.title: JORDAN: PLO's Arafat to meet Jordan's King Hussein.
newsitem.headline: PLO's Arafat to meet Jordan's King Hussein.

text.p: Palestinian President Yasser Arafat will visit Jordan's King Hussein on Wednesday at the monarch's Aqaba seaside palace where he is recuperating after prostate surgery, a palace official said on Tuesday.
Officials say Arafat will seek the king's support in pulling the Middle East peace process out of a deep crisis sparked by Israel's decision to build a Jewish settlement in Arab East Jerusalem.

The king's intervention helped early in the year to seal a long delayed accord on Israeli troop withdrawal from 80 percent of the West Bank town of Hebron and a timetable for further redeployment from the West Bank.
